shapes3d
Class Xshape

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.Shape3D
      shapes3d.Xshape
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
public class Xshape
extends Shape3D

This is a simple way for users to add their own shapes so they work as part of the Shapes3D library.
To use this class create your shape class which must implement the IShape interface to work with this library). Then you create an object of your class and use setXShape to add it to an Xshape object.

Author:
Peter Lager
